awd_titl_txt: Phase II Conversion of R/V Weatherbird II
awd_abstract_narration: The 115 foot WEATHERBIRD II was purchased and partially refitted                as a research vessel in 1989 with private funds by the Bermuda                  Biological Station for Research, Inc.  It replaced a smaller,                   less capable research vessel.  This project will supply funds for               the ship's continued conversion into a more capable research                    vessel.  Funds will be used to add a deck house for laboratories,               install a bow thruster of improved maneuverability, convert                     unused voids into additional state rooms and improve                            habitability.                                                                                                                                                   The project will be under the direction of Howard S. Barnes,                    Assistant Director for Operations.  He is fully qualified to                    direct this project having considerable experience in similar                   work including direction of the earlier refit.

inst.inst_name: Bermuda Institute of Ocean Sciences (BIOS), Inc.
inst.org_lgl_bus_name: BERMUDA INSTITUTE OF OCEAN SCIENCES (BIOS) INC.
